## About this site

This site was created using R (version 3.5.1) and is a requirement for a [Data Science class](http://p8105.com/index.html) offered at Columbia University through the Biostatistics Department.

The answer for **Problem 2** can be accessed by clicking the "NYC Restaurant Inspection Data" tab in the site navigation bar. 

For questions about content/source code, please contact me. 

This site was last updated on November 2, 2018.
